data.name: 幻想曹操传2 Fantasy of Caocao2
data.detailed_description:
Story

Caocao, build cards and fight. Collect history roles and finally defeat Devil Rican.

Features

*A stand-alone indie game
*Really excellent and beautiful character image and cg
*Light SLG, happy in painting color
*Roguelike, discover, battle and make choice
*DBG, build cards , defeat enemy
*True Three Kingdoms history, discover a different story.

Gameplay

*Game has 3 volumes, each volume has 3 chapters, each chapter has 2 phases. In phase 1, you can finish story or build cards in limited actions. In phase 2, you need to finish a series things like, story, battle, choice, and builds. When finish a volume, you will unlock new volume and use new job cards, extends role cards and partner buffs.
*Battle cards, includes job cards and role cards. You can only buy/remove/power up job cards at shop or some nodes in phase2. You can collect role cards through history and battle, then choose who to join next battle at any time.
*Partner buffs, collect through stories, get forever buffs.

From developers

Hello everyone, I am Sunny.
I decided spend more time and money to develop an interesting game.

bilibili：桑尼游戏
afdian：桑尼游戏
qq group：873111054

data.short_description: 《Fantasy of Caocao 2》is a stand-alone indie game which includes RPG+Rougelike+DBG，Caocao builds cards and collects history roles and finally defeat Devil Rican.
data.supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2G Hz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
